Actions¶

The actions handle sequential events of receiving, labeling, and packing. A specimen must be flagged as received before a label may be printed. The specimen identifier is allocated when the specimen is flagged as received. A specimen may not be packed without a specimen identifier.

lab_requisition.actions.flag_as_not_labelled(modeladmin, request, queryset)¶
lab_requisition.actions.flag_as_not_received(modeladmin, request, queryset)¶
lab_requisition.actions.flag_as_received(modeladmin, request, queryset, **kwargs)¶

Flags specimen(s) as received and generates a globally specimen identifier.

lab_requisition.actions.print_requisition_label(modeladmin, request, requisitions)¶

Prints a specimen label for a received specimen using the print_label() method attached to the requisition model.
